claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

verified_evidence.quote: Two large studies have explored rVE of recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4). The Medicare beneficiaries study [10] using retrospective data as described above, reported significant rVE of RIV4 vs. SD-IIV4) against influenza related hospital encounters. Secondly, a randomized controlled trial (RCT) found significant rVE of RIV4 compared with SD-IIV4 among adults 50 years old, but not for adults 65 years old [11].
verified_evidence.explanation: The quote explicitly states that a randomized controlled trial (RCT) compared recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) with standard dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine (SD-IIV4, which includes Fluarix). The document further clarifies in the tables and footnotes that SD-IIV4 includes Fluarix. Therefore, the quote directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in a pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
verified_evidence.presence_explanation: The quote appears on page 2 of the document: 'Two large studies have explored rVE of recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4). The Medicare beneficiaries study [10] using retrospective data as described above, reported significant rVE of RIV4 vs. SD-IIV4) against influenza related hospital encounters. Secondly, a randomized controlled trial (RCT) found significant rVE of RIV4 compared with SD-IIV4 among adults 50 years old, but not for adults 65 years old [11].' The content and meaning of the quote are preserved, with only minor formatting differences.
verified_evidence.support_explanation: The quote explicitly states that a randomized controlled trial (RCT) compared recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) with standard dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine (SD-IIV4, which includes Fluarix). The document further clarifies in the tables and footnotes that SD-IIV4 includes Fluarix. Therefore, the quote directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in a pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote explicitly states that a randomized controlled trial (RCT) compared the recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) with the standard dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine (SD-IIV4, which includes Fluarix), directly supporting the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in a pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

verified_evidence.quote: SD-IIV4 included Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax. HD-IIV4 was High Dose Fluzone, RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd.
verified_evidence.explanation: The quote explicitly lists the vaccine types used in the study, showing that SD-IIV4 included Fluarix (a quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) and that RIV4 was Flublok. This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine), as both vaccines were included in the comparative analysis.
verified_evidence.presence_explanation: The quote appears in the document on page 2: 'Influenza vaccines were identified through the EMR; SD-IIV4 included Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Flu zone and FlucelVax. HD-IIV4 was High Dose Flu zone, RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd.' The factual content and vaccine names match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting differences (e.g., 'Flu zone' vs. 'Fluzone').
verified_evidence.support_explanation: The quote explicitly lists the vaccine types used in the study, showing that SD-IIV4 included Fluarix (a quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) and that RIV4 was Flublok. This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine), as both vaccines were included in the comparative analysis.
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote defines the vaccine types used in the study, confirming that Flublok (RIV4) and Fluarix (SD-IIV4) were among the vaccines compared, directly supporting the claim that Flublok was evaluated against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

verified_evidence.quote: c RIV4: Flublok. c SD-IIV4: Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Flu zone and FlucelVax.
verified_evidence.explanation: The quote directly supports the claim. It explicitly lists Flublok as RIV4 and Fluarix as one of the SD-IIV4 vaccines. Since the study compares RIV4 (Flublok) to SD-IIV4 (which includes Fluarix), this confirms that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) in the pivotal trial described in the document.
